alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Claiborne; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 02 at 8:18PM CST until January 02 at 8:45PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN WEBSTER...SOUTHWESTERN CLAIBORNE AND NORTHERN BIENVILLE PARISHES... At 817 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Haynesville to near Homer to near Dubberly to near Heflin to 6 miles northwest of Ringgold, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Minden, Homer, Arcadia, Sibley, Gibsland, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Heflin, Athens, Lisbon, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Plum Orchard Landing, Gilark, Sailes, Noles Landing, Lake Bistineau North, Lake Clairborne and Ogden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
